Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.6 Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.6.1 Kusalākusalapada » 2.6.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalākusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
95.
1453Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
96.
1454Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ. (Hetupaccayo natthi. Pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ, pañhāvārepi imesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ hetupaccayo natthi.)
<< Hetuup2.6.2 Abyākatapada >>
